diff_hunk:
@@ -2833,6 +2833,29 @@ def foo(x, y):
         foo.graph.propagate_shapes((a, b), False)
         self.assertExpected(str(foo.graph))
 
+    def test_intlist_args(self):
+        def foo_0(x):
+            return torch.nn.functional.adaptive_avg_pool1d(x, 1)
+
+        @torch.jit.script
+        def foo_1(x):
+            return torch.nn.functional.adaptive_avg_pool1d(x, 1)
+
+        @torch.jit.script
+        def foo_2(x):
+            return torch.nn.functional.adaptive_avg_pool1d(x, output_size=1)
+
+        @torch.jit.script
+        def foo_3(x):
+            return torch.nn.functional.adaptive_avg_pool1d(x, output_size=[1])
+
+        x = torch.randn(8, 8, 8)
+        r = foo_0(x)
+
+        self.assertEqual(r, foo_1(x))
+        self.assertEqual(r, foo_2(x))
+        self.assertEqual(r, foo_3(x))
body: Sure, sorry, didn't know about it.
